title: Beyond Screen Size: Responsive Theming
subtitle: Managing styles for different viewing distances.
leftBullets: TV UIs require much larger fonts and UI elements to be legible from a distance.
Higher contrast is crucial for readability in a living room environment.
Create separate themes for each platform to manage these differences cleanly.
This approach keeps platform-specific styling organized and easy to modify.
